resources.string: It looks like there was an error signing in to the application
Make sure the scale led is blinking on red color before you continue. In any other case press and hold the button for 7 seconds until the blinking begins.
Introduce the server address or scan the QR located on the Raspberry PI.
There is something wrong with the server, or the address is incorrect.
Select the scale you wish to add:
Select the house where you wish to install the scale:
Select the litter in which you wish to install the scale:
Set a name to indentify the scale:
Select the BlackBox you wish to add:
Select the house where you wish to install the BlackBox:
Set a name to identify the BlackBox:
Make sure the BlackBox led is blinking on red color before you continue. In any other case press and hold the button for 7 seconds until the blinking begins.
